name: meowmasher
description: The clicker game all about cats

scripts.dev-funcs: cd dev/scripts && node yamlToJson.js && node subUpgradePdf.js && node loc.js && py loc_pie_charts.py && cd ../..
scripts.build-exe:windows: python -m PyInstaller main.py --name MeowMasher --add-data "index.html;." --add-data "package.json;." --add-data "save.json;." --add-data "src;src" --icon favicon.ico --windowed --distpath dist/windows
scripts.build-exe:unix: python3 -m PyInstaller main.py --name MeowMasher --add-data index.html:. --add-data package.json:. --add-data save.json:. --add-data src:src --icon favicon.ico --windowed --distpath dist/unix

author: JBassard97
